title: Callaway Men's Short Sleeve Opti-Dri™ Performance Golf Polo Shirt (Size Small - 4X Big & Tall)
description: MOISTURE WICKING: This men's golf shirt features Opti-Dri moisture-wicking technology that wicks sweat away from your body while allowing optimal breathability, so you can always finish your game feeling dry and comfortable.

VENTILATED FOR YOUR COMFORT: The Callaway short sleeve golf shirt has ventilated fabric that circulates air to transfer heat away from your body to keep you cool. With this golf shirt, those hot days won't stop you from working on your game.
LIGHTWEIGHT: This golf polo has single knit fabrication which creates a lightweight material that provides comfortable coverage on warm weather days when you're out on the golf course.
STRETCH: The men's polo shirt is made from stretch fabric that allows for a full range of motion for smooth swings on every hole without ever feeling constricted.
GENEROUS FIT: This style was created with a more generous fit to comfortably accommodate more body types.
EXTENDED SIZES: This golf shirt is available in big and tall sizes to provide comfortable coverage and a full range of motion.
Swing through the second cut with ease in our Short Sleeve Opti-Vent Polo from the Callaway Standard Collection, which fuses our most classic look into a roomier fit.
The sleek horizontal stripes are crafted with a light hue, accenting the main color and providing a subtle two-toned effect. Our Callaway Tour Heat Seal Logo is located on the right sleeve.
Our Opti-Dri moisture wicking technology pulls sweat away from your body so you can cool down in the heat and Opti-Vent engineered ventilation for enhanced comfort and cooling action.
